chapters.summary: Bob Doty and Sarah Long tell about the mystery of time. No one knows what time itself is. We know it only by the way we mark its passing. For all our success in measuring the smallest parts of time time remains one of the great mysteries of the universe.
chapters.headline: June Sims: No one knows what time itself is

chapters.summary: Time on Earth is set by the sun's position in the sky above. Can time move backward? Some scientists believe there is one reason why time only moves forward. The debate will continue about the nature of time and time will remain a mystery.
chapters.gist: Does Time Move Forward or Back?
chapters.headline: Can time move forward or backward? Some scientists believe time only moves forward
